00025 void UdpExchange::Create(int port)
00026 {
00027     InitForUdpExchange(port);
00028     StartThread();

00031 void UdpExchange::Disconnect()
00032 {
00033     SmartLocker SL_listUdpConnections(listUdpConnections);
00034 
00035     for(listUdpConnections.First(); listUdpConnections.NotAtEnd();
00036         listUdpConnections.Next())
00037     {
00038         delete (listUdpConnections.GetCurrent());
00039         listUdpConnections.RemoveCurrent();
00040     }
00041 }
00042 
00043 void UdpExchange::Close()
00044 {
00045     Stop();
00046     GetSocket()->Close();
00047 }

00049 int UdpExchange::SendTo(int len, const char* buf, const char* addr, int port)
00050 {
00051     UdpConnection udp_connect;
00052 
00053     //REVIEW
00054     /*
00055     udp_connect.addr.sin_family = AF_INET;
00056     udp_connect.addr.sin_port = htons(port);
00057     if(!strcmp(addr, ""))  udp_connect.addr.sin_addr.s_addr = INADDR_ANY;
00058     else udp_connect.addr.sin_addr.s_addr = inet_addr(addr);
00059     memset(&(udp_connect.addr.sin_zero), 0, 8); */
00060     if ( Socket::FillAddrIn( &udp_connect.addr, addr, port ) == false )
00061         return -1;      // Socket error
00062 
00063     return MsgSocket::SendTo(len, buf, &udp_connect);

00065 
00066 int UdpExchange::SendTo(int len, const char* buf, unsigned int pid)
00067 {
00068     int nb_send = 0;
00069 
00070     SmartLocker SL_listUdpConnections(listUdpConnections);
00071 
00072     UdpConnection* ptr = FindConnectionFromId(pid);
00073     if(ptr)
00074     {
00075         try
00076         {
00077             nb_send = MsgSocket::SendTo(len, buf, ptr);
00078         }
00079         catch( SocketException &e )
00080         {
00081             OmiscidTrace( "Error while sending to all peer %8.8x : %s (%d)\n", pid, e.msg.GetStr(), e.err );
00082         }
00083     }
00084 
00085     return nb_send;
00086 }
00087 
00088 void UdpExchange::SendToAll(int len, const char* buf)
00089 {
00090     SmartLocker SL_listUdpConnections(listUdpConnections);
00091 
00092     for(listUdpConnections.First(); listUdpConnections.NotAtEnd(); listUdpConnections.Next())
00093     {
00094         try
00095         {
00096             SendTo(len, buf, (listUdpConnections.GetCurrent()));
00097         }
00098         catch( SocketException &e )
00099         {
00100             OmiscidTrace( "Error while sending to all peers : %s (%d)\n", e.msg.GetStr(), e.err );
00101         }
00102     }
00103 }

00105 int UdpExchange::GetNbConnections()
00106 {
00107     SmartLocker SL_listUdpConnections(listUdpConnections);
00108 
00109     int nb = listUdpConnections.GetNumberOfElements();
00110 
00111     return nb;
00112 }

00114 UdpConnection* UdpExchange::AcceptConnection(const UdpConnection& udp_connect, bool msg_empty)
00115 {
00116     //std::cerr << "in UdpExchange::acceptConnection(UdpConnection*)\n";
00117 
00118     SmartLocker SL_listUdpConnections(listUdpConnections);
00119 
00120     UdpConnection* udp_found = NULL;
00121     for ( listUdpConnections.First(); !udp_found && listUdpConnections.NotAtEnd(); listUdpConnections.Next())
00122     {
00123         if(udp_connect == *(listUdpConnections.GetCurrent()))
00124         {
00125             udp_found = listUdpConnections.GetCurrent();
00126         }
00127     }
00128 
00129     if(!udp_found && msg_empty)
00130     {
00131         udp_found = new OMISCID_TLM UdpConnection(udp_connect);
00132         listUdpConnections.Add(udp_found);
00133     }
00134     else if (!msg_empty)
00135     {
00136         OmiscidTrace( "Connection UDP from refused (Unknown, not initialized with empty message)\n");
00137     }
00138     return udp_found;
00139 }

00141 int UdpExchange::GetListPeerId(SimpleList<unsigned int>& listId)
00142 {
00143     int nb =0;
00144 
00145     SmartLocker SL_listUdpConnections(listUdpConnections);
00146 
00147     for(listUdpConnections.First(); listUdpConnections.NotAtEnd(); listUdpConnections.Next())
00148     {
00149         listId.Add((listUdpConnections.GetCurrent())->pid);
00150         nb++;
00151     }
00152 
00153     return nb;
00154 }
00155 
00156 UdpConnection* UdpExchange::FindConnectionFromId(unsigned int id)
00157 {
00158     unsigned int SearchId = id;
00159 
00160     SmartLocker SL_listUdpConnections(listUdpConnections);
00161 
00162     for(listUdpConnections.First(); listUdpConnections.NotAtEnd(); listUdpConnections.Next())
00163     {
00164         if( listUdpConnections.GetCurrent()->pid == SearchId )
00165         {
00166 
00167             return listUdpConnections.GetCurrent();
00168         }
00169     }
00170 
00171     // By default search for the ServiceId
00172     SearchId = id & ComTools::SERVICE_PEERID;
00173 
00174     for(listUdpConnections.First(); listUdpConnections.NotAtEnd(); listUdpConnections.Next())
00175     {
00176         if ( SearchId == (listUdpConnections.GetCurrent()->pid & ComTools::SERVICE_PEERID) )
00177         {
00178             SL_listUdpConnections.Unlock();
00179             return listUdpConnections.GetCurrent();
00180         }
00181     }
00182 
00183     return NULL;
00184 }
00185 
00187 bool UdpExchange::DisconnectPeerId(unsigned int PeerId)
00188 {
00189     bool ret = false;
00190 
00191     // remove all connection from a service !
00192     unsigned int SearchId = PeerId & ComTools::SERVICE_PEERID;
00193 
00194     SmartLocker SL_listUdpConnections(listUdpConnections);
00195 
00196     for(listUdpConnections.First(); listUdpConnections.NotAtEnd(); listUdpConnections.Next())
00197     {
00198         if( SearchId == (listUdpConnections.GetCurrent()->pid & ComTools::SERVICE_PEERID))
00199         {
00200             delete listUdpConnections.GetCurrent();
00201             listUdpConnections.RemoveCurrent();
00202             ret = true;
00203         }
00204     }
00205 
00206     return ret;
00207 }
00208 
00209 bool UdpExchange::RemoveConnectionWithId(unsigned int pid)
00210 {
00211     SmartLocker SL_listUdpConnections(listUdpConnections);
00212 
00213     for(listUdpConnections.First(); listUdpConnections.NotAtEnd(); listUdpConnections.Next())
00214     {
00215         if(listUdpConnections.GetCurrent()->pid == pid)
00216         {
00217             delete listUdpConnections.GetCurrent();
00218             listUdpConnections.RemoveCurrent();
00219             return true;
00220         }
00221     }
00222     return false;
00223 }

00225 void UdpExchange::SetServiceId(unsigned int pid)
00226 {
00227     // Check validity of a service Id
00228     if ( (pid & ComTools::CONNECTOR_ID) == 0 )
00229     {
00230         // pid = pid | 0xffffff01;
00231 #ifdef DEBUG
00232         //              fprintf( stderr, "Warning: ConnectorId could not be 0 for UdpExchange. Value changes to 1 (PeerId = %8.8x)\n", pid );
00233 #endif
00234     }
00235     MsgSocket::SetServiceId(pid);
00236 }
